page.title: 15MISS JUNE LEWIS, AUTHORESS.
page.content: {Miss Lewis}is a well-known writer on Cotswold subjects as well as being the school secretary and instructor in Commercial Subjects at Farmor's School, Fairford. She is also a {Cotswold Warden.} Her books have included subjects as diverse as typing manuals, books on rural crafts, Cotswold villages, a novel 'The Witches Mark', and various local history and local recipe books. Her delight in the area stems from its beautiful stone-built architecture and eventful history. In line with this she keeps three sheep of the rare Cotswold breed. Miss Lewis has lived all her life in the area and she was, as a schoolgirl, headgirl at Farmor's school. She lives in a bungalow near the cricket field in Park Street, Fairford. The Cotswold Way is the subject of her next book.
